to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: speakup modified etch install
body:
Shane and all,

The new ISO booted up fine on my system, an Intel 945 motherboard with
a Sata drive. I did not go past the opening installation screen though.

Thanks for a great contribution, Shane. 

Chuck

-- 
The Moon is Waning Crescent (5% of Full)
 But you can get a few downloads from http://www.mhcable.com/~chuckh
 The early bird may get the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese.
